page.title: 06Daily life/leisure Pursuits
page.content: Household cleaning and repairs are mostly done by home members but some of the elderly have outside help. preparation and serving meals occupies much time. Home baking is more popular than purchasung pre-packed frozen meals and most homes find freezers invaluable. All homes have gardens which are well cared for and colourful, Grass is kept mowed, hedges clipped and vegetable patches cultivated to produce household needs. Dogs and cats are the usual pets which require grooming, exercise and feeding. Relatives and friends to a meal or longer visit is very popular. In the home time is spent relaxing watching favourite television programmes playing with children orparticipationg in women's crafts and men's hobbies.
